title: "Battelle and Spark Biomedical, Inc. Join Forces to Advance Bioelectric Treatment Solutions for Opioid Use Disorder"
excerpt: "Battelle, the largest independent nonprofit applied science and technology organization in the world, and Spark Biomedical, Inc., a leading developer of wearable neurostimulation solutions, entered into a collaborative agreement to jointly run a pilot clinical study to advance remote detection and treatment of opioid use disorder (OUD)."
